subject: Alpine Skiing
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn and Maria Riesch were expecting their season-long battle for the title to come down to a dramatic conclusion in the final giant slalom race, but it was canceled, leaving Riesch the champion.
snippet: Lindsey Vonn and Maria Riesch were expecting their season-long battle for the title to come down to a dramatic conclusion in the final giant slalom race, but it was canceled, leaving Riesch the champion.
